name: Ometron
overview: Stuck out on a lonely uninhabited outpost of the empire, your mission is to protect the landing site from the hostile forces. You are in a prime site, right in the middle of the landing grid, armed to the teeth with cannons in a revolving turret. Nothing is going to get past you... or is it? RED ALERT RED ALERT Ships sighted, treat all craft as hostile and fire on sight!
